name: Dungeon Farm (Nev)
description:
THIS WAS FOR A GAME JAM  CONTROLS

MOVEMENT = WASD

SIGN = PRESS E TO READ SIGNS

FARMING = P TO INITIATE PLANT MODE AND RIGHT CLICK TO PLANT ON SOIL

SWITCH CROPS = SCROLL WHEEL

WAIT = G THIS WILL MAKE THE PLANTS GROW ONE STAGE UP

INVENTORY = PRESS I

THE SPRITES USED IN THIS GAME CAN BE FOUND USING THESE LINKS

https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii - DUNGEON ASSETS

https://thomasgvd.itch.io/top-down-shooter - PLAYER AND AN ENEMY
